content: Hi, I highly believe in the Attraction Law. I bought a book yesterday called Focus by Daniel Goleman and today, I found your article on my inbox. This is beyond words. Meanwhile, one of my best friends has sent me this: https://youtu.be/G8W3hqNi5yY and I hope this video and the book can be a life changer for many. To be honest, I’m reading a book called The 80/20 Manager by Richard Koch https://www.amazon.com/80-20-Manager-Working-Achieving/dp/031624306X and I’m planning once I finish it, I’ll start reading Focus because that’s exactly what I need in my life at the moment. I need to focus. Many thanks for this article!
